title: The Known World of Ice and Fire
description:
The Known World
A Hi-res scan of the map The Known World in the collection, "The Lands of Ice and Fire."
Created in 2012
Original Size: 3 foot by 2 foot
Scanned to 6866x4528 pixels
Size: 32mb

This map is a 3x2 foot folded poster. I had to build a platform around my HP flatbed scanner so I would be able to scan sections. It required 12 scans to capture the whole map.
I then had to use paint software to try to remove the very visible cardboard fold damage. After that, stitching software was required to join the sections. It took 6 stitches, which had to be attempted multiple times to get a decent outcome, since more than 1 edge was involved.
Yes it was a big job, which was why I did not do the Journey's map as had been my intention.

The results are not perfect but this is still the best digital version of this map presently available. 

 I am reissuing this torrent  slightly renamed with this .nfo file because it has been copied to torrent sites using exactly the same name as my original, thereby preventing me from uploading it to some sites
